page.title: 16INTERVIEW- TEACHER
page.content: Mrs. H. Tootle was born in 1941.She works at present at Dove Bank Primary and also attended the school as a pupil.What changes has she seen? The school now used was started in 1974, a few metres from the old site which is alongside the graveyard. Mrs.Tootle began teaching in the old building in 1970. The old school had seven classes like the present one but they were bigger with wooden floors. As a pupil,she remembers the teachers coming to school on bikes. There was no made road leading to the school,only a dirt track.She disliked the cows in the surrounding fields! Things have changed: then there was no swimming or outings. Boys and girls had separate playgrounds. BY DEBRA BECKETT AND GRAHAM HASSALL.
